text: there are hundreds of great ways to
roast a chicken this is one of the
easiest and one of the best this is one
of those barebone recipes all I did was
season the chicken with some salt some
pepper and then I made a little bouquet
out of herbs you can use any herbs that
you like try to find an air chilled
chicken that actually does have the best
flavor if you can't find that look for
organic it's another indicator of a
really good quality chicken in a perfect
world you'd season the chicken the night
before salt and pepper it ahead leave it
in the fridge uncovered so that the skin
can dry out a little bit however if you
don't have time just salt and pepper it
may be an hour before just a little bit
to give it a chance to absorb all those
flavors if you want a neat little
package of a chicken you can tie the
legs up before putting it in the pan it
makes it a little more attractive but if
you don't have kitchen twine or you
don't want to bother it's perfectly fine
without it it actually doesn't really
affect the final flavor just the
presentation you could use a roasting
rack if you wanted to but I like to just
throw it on the bottom of a skillet
because the skin gets really crisp that
way
if you're nervous about your chicken
being cooked through go ahead and use a
thermometer you're looking for 165 but
you could also just take a paring knife
and just cut in right at the thick part
of the thigh and what you're looking for
is for the juices to run clear if you
see a little bit of red then just put
the chicken back in the oven for another
couple of minutes the most delicious
roast chicken in the world is never
boring
Oh
